name: steganographix-wails3
description: Congratulations on generating your Wails3 application! This README will guide you through the next steps to get your project up and running.
author: Péter Komlósi

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:windows
scripts.check: ( cd frontend; npm run lint && npm run test )
scripts.package:all: npm run package && npm run package:windows
